c1.name: Starfire's Flowing Light
c1.descriptionRaw: While <color=#FFD780FF>Blazing Threshold</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Scorching Threshold</color> are active, the current active character deals 6% increased DMG. If said character is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, they will deal an additional 9% DMG.

c2.name: Ever-Lit Candle
c2.descriptionRaw: Within 12s of using the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Flowfire Blade</color>, after nearby party members trigger a <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro-related reaction</color> on an opponent, the Traveler will regain 14 Nightsoul points. Each use of <color=#FFD780FF>Flowfire Blade</color> will restore at most 28 Nightsoul points in this way.

c6.name: The Sacred Flame Imperishable
c6.descriptionRaw: While in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, the Traveler's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will be converted to Nightsoul-aligned <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> that cannot be overridden, and the CRIT DMG of these attacks is increased by 40%.
